text_elements.typography_notes: The text is stylized and artistic, which may affect readability at smaller sizes.

symbol.description: A stylized fish grill with a red accent

color_palette.contrast_notes: The black and red contrast well against the white background.

layout.balance_notes: The logo is well-balanced with the text and symbol centered.
layout.spacing_notes: Adequate white space around the elements enhances readability.

brand_message.audience_hint: food enthusiasts, particularly those interested in Korean cuisine

issues.description: The stylized font may be hard to read at smaller sizes.

improvement_cues.suggestion: Consider a slightly clearer font for smaller applications.

trend_alignment.notes: The logo aligns with trends emphasizing cultural authenticity and artistic expression.
